subtitle: This chilled dessert is good for summer dinner parties as it can be prepared in advance. It looks beautiful and is a lighter alternative to mousses, as well as being easier to make!

method.text: Place the apple juice, apples, allspice and sugar in a heavy-based pan. Cover and cook gently for 15-20 min until softened, stirring occasionally. Leave to cool.
Mash the raspberries with a fork and stir in the liqueur, if using.
Layer the apples and raspberries alternately in individual glasses, reserving a little of the raspberry puree.
Spoon over the cream to cover. Drizzle over the remaining raspberry puree and swirl into a pattern with a fine skewer.

title: Spiced apple and raspberry layer
